item.title: 美国生产者价格下调后略有回升
item.description: 美国 8 月份的生产者价格在上月数据下调后略有回升，这进一步证明通胀压力正在减缓。【原文：US producer prices picked up slightly in August after the previous month’s numbers were revised lower, adding to evidence that inflationary pressures are moderating.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行行长计划打击黄金支持货币破坏者
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行誓言将 "加倍努力 "打击货币破坏者，该行指责是他们煽动了该国以金银为支持的货币单位在平行市场上的下跌。【原文：Zimbabwe’s central bank vowed to “double efforts” against currency saboteurs it blames for fanning the decline of the nation’s bullion-backed unit on the parallel market.】

item.title: 政府镇压结束后，中国科技为何没有反弹？
item.description: 中国花了两年多的时间来整顿国内最强大的私营科技公司，包括阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司、腾讯控股有限公司和滴滴出行公司，以及这些公司极其富有的创始人。【原文：China spent the better part of two years reining in the country’s most powerful private technology companies, including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Didi Global Inc., along with their ultra-rich founders.】

item.title: 欧洲央行再次降息，原因是通胀减弱和经济蹒跚学步
item.description: 欧洲中央银行今年第二次降低利率，通胀率正在向 2% 靠拢，人们对经济的担忧日益加剧。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered interest rates for the second time this year with inflation receding toward 2% and concerns about the economy building.】

item.title: 泰国将发放 42 亿美元现金以促进经济发展
item.description: 泰国将于本月开始向其公民发放一次性现金援助，以重振这个东南亚第二大经济体。【原文：Thailand will start rolling out a one-time cash assistance to its citizens this month, as authorities seek to revitalize Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy】

item.title: 具备推理能力的 OpenAI "草莓 "模型即将发布
item.description:
这家初创公司表示，具有推理能力的人工智能代表着技术进步的重要一步。【原文：

The startup has said AI with the power to reason represents a significant step in the technology’s progress. 

】

item.title: 经济低迷，德国电力创四个月新低
item.description: 由于市场似乎对该地区挣扎中的经济及其对能源需求的潜在影响持谨慎态度，德国的年前电力交易量创下了 4 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：German year-ahead power traded at the lowest level since April as the market seems wary of the region’s struggling economy and its potential impact on energy demand.】

item.title: 印度 8 月通胀率仍低于央行目标
item.description: 印度的零售通胀率连续第二个月低于央行的目标值，这使得降息前景变得更加复杂。【原文：India’s retail inflation stayed below the central bank’s target aim for the second straight month, complicating the outlook for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 泽连斯基证实俄罗斯已开始库尔斯克反攻
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）说，俄罗斯军队已在其西部库尔斯克地区开始反攻，以击退自二战以来对其领土的首次军事入侵。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said Russian forces had begun a counteroffensive in its western Kursk region in an effort to push back the first military incursion on its territory since World War II.】

item.title: 万事达卡同意以 26.5 亿美元收购网络防御公司
item.description: 万事达卡公司同意以 26.5 亿美元收购网络防御公司 Recorded Future，以增强其保护万事达卡公司庞大的全球支付系统的能力。【原文：Mastercard Inc. agreed to buy cyber-defense firm Recorded Future for $2.65 billion to boost its ability to protect the card company’s massive global-payments system.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行将重组私人银行和资产管理部门
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）将对其私人银行和资产管理业务进行大刀阔斧的改革，包括为其另类投资经理任命一位新主管，这是该部门在最近任命的新主管领导下进行的首次大规模改组。【原文：Banco Santander SA is set to make sweeping changes in its private banking and asset management businesses, including appointing a new chief for its alternative investments manager, in the first large reshuffle of the unit under its recently appointed new head.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服再融资 65 亿美元信贷额度
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司正在对一笔海外信贷进行再融资，金额将达到65亿美元，以扩大其全球业务。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. is refinancing an offshore credit line that will reach $6.5 billion, as it expands its global operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 从美联储到大选，外汇动荡为美元投资者提供了缓冲
item.description: 所有迹象都表明，在美国总统大选辩论和一项关键的通胀数据公布后，市场预计年底前美元走势将更加动荡。【原文：All signs point to a tough few months ahead for investors charting the dollar’s path, after the US presidential debate and a key inflation reading left markets anticipating heightened volatility through year-end.】

item.title: 石油市场的平衡只会越来越差
item.description:
库存量一直在下降，但大量供应将在明年推动库存量回升。【原文：

Stockpiles have been declining, but a flood of supply will push them back up next year.

】

item.title: 欧洲需求低迷，Stellantis 将暂停 e-Fiat 500 的生产
item.description: 由于欧洲订单不足，Stellantis NV 将在下个月停止在意大利都灵生产菲亚特 500 电动车型。【原文：Stellantis NV will halt production of the electric Fiat 500 model in Turin, Italy over the next month due to a lack of orders in Europe.】

item.title: 周期触底，空头抛弃欧洲房地产股票
item.description: 由于预期利率下降将支撑股票估值，卖空者正在关闭对欧洲房地产公司的更多看跌押注。【原文：Short sellers are closing more bearish bets on European property companies because of expectations falling interest rates will support stock valuations.】

item.title: 西班尼削减产量以扭转美国钯金矿的局面
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 计划重组其在蒙大拿州的矿场，将钯金和铂金的产量削减多达 45%，以恢复其盈利能力。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. plans to restructure its mines in Montana, cutting output of palladium and platinum by as much as 45% in a bid to return them to profitability.】

item.title: 辩论显示马斯克的 X 不再假装政治平衡
item.description: X 非常肯定唐纳德-特朗普赢得了辩论，但首先...【原文：X is pretty sure that Donald Trump won the debate, but first…】

item.title: 高盛处于购买 4.5 亿欧元银行贷款的有利位置
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is in pole position to purchase a portfolio of around €450 million ($497 million) of loans from Spanish bank Bankinter SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 德国游说欧盟帮助更多企业支付电费
item.description: 在俄罗斯决定限制对欧洲最大经济体的天然气供应后，德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）正在努力扩大国家对那些因电费上涨而苦苦挣扎的企业的支持。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is working on expanding state support for companies struggling with higher electricity bills following Russia’s decision to curb gas supplies to Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 核电初创企业 Fuse 获得新一轮融资，估值超过 2 亿美元
item.description: 近年来，核聚变的梦想吸引了投资者的目光，在技术突破、新的联邦资金以及廉价、丰富的能源承诺的推动下，私人资金激增。【原文：Dreams of nuclear fusion have captured investors’ attention in recent years, spurring a boom in private funding driven by technological breakthroughs, new federal funding and the promise of cheap, abundant energy.】

item.title: 亿万富翁艾萨克曼开始历史性的私人太空行走
item.description: 亿万富翁贾里德-艾萨克曼（Jared Isaacman）周四创造了历史，他走出太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的太空舱，进行了世界上首次商业太空行走。【原文：Billionaire Jared Isaacman made history on Thursday, exiting a SpaceX capsule to perform the world’s first commercial space walk.】

item.title: 通胀降温，巴基斯坦降息振兴经济
item.description: 巴基斯坦连续第三次下调基准利率，原因是通胀放缓为决策者提供了恢复经济增长的空间。【原文：Pakistan cut its benchmark interest rate for a third consecutive meeting as slowing inflation gave policymakers space to revive economic growth.】

item.title: 欧洲央行利率决议
item.description: 法兰克福欧洲中央银行总部。摄影师亚历克斯-克劳斯【原文：The headquarters of the European Central Bank in Frankfurt. Photographer: Alex Kraus】

item.title: 美国和欧盟打击大型科技公司对苹果、谷歌和 X 意味着什么？
item.description: 多年来，全球最大的科技公司在很大程度上能够抵制政府的监督。这种情况正在迅速改变。【原文：For years, the world’s biggest technology companies were largely able to resist government oversight. That’s changing fast.】

item.title: Orcel 称德国知道裕信银行持有德国商业银行 4.5% 的股份
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）在披露了其持有德国商业银行 9% 股份的消息后表示，有关方面对联合信贷银行投资德国商业银行并不感到意外。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s investment in Commerzbank AG shouldn’t have come as a surprise to the relevant parties, the Italian lender’s Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said in a bid to address some concerns after disclosing a 9% stake in the German bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 科技股推动全球股市反弹，石油因需求放缓的迹象而回落，中国市场情绪低迷。以下是市场动向。【原文：Technology stocks power a global rally, oil pulls back as signs of slowing demand emerge, and China sentiment falters. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 微软将在 Xbox 游戏部门裁员 650 人
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）表示将在其 Xbox 部门裁员 650 人，这是该公司今年第三次裁员，因为该公司正试图控制成本并整合其斥资 690 亿美元巨资收购的动视暴雪公司（Activision Blizzard Inc.【原文：Microsoft Corp. said it is cutting 650 jobs in its Xbox unit, the third such layoffs this year as the company tries to rein in costs and integrate its massive $69 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard Inc.】

item.title: 新加坡凯德置地调整基金部门领导层
item.description: 新加坡凯德置地投资有限公司（CapitaLand Investment Ltd.）宣布对其私人基金部门的领导层进行调整，这家房地产公司在经历了一系列喜忧参半的收益和不温不火的股价表现后，希望重新安排各部门。【原文：Singapore’s CapitaLand Investment Ltd. announced a leadership shakeup at its private funds division, as the real estate firm looks to rearrange units after a mixed set of earnings and tepid stock performance.】

item.title: 潮湿天气影响业绩，Fevertree 跌至八年新低
item.description: Fevertree Drinks Plc 的股价跌至八年来的最低点，原因是这家高端滋补品生产商在发布了以恶劣天气为特征的业绩后，下调了年度销售增长预期。【原文：Fevertree Drinks Plc shares dropped to an eight-year low as the high-end tonic maker slashed annual sales growth expectations following results that were marked by poor weather.】
